name: Home Run Bash
description:
Go for the glory of being the new home run king in Home Run Bash, the home run hitting game for your Android phone or tablet by AAGH Games. Select your stadium and try to time your swing with the pitch to hit the baseball clean out of the park. You can also burst the many floating balloons over the playing field to really rack up a high score. Good luck, and have fun!

Updates:

July 20th 2016: Updated the user interface and fixed some small audio glitches
